name: Make pixel SAR 1/1
desc: Rescale the image to make pixel sample aspect ratio 1.

name: Set SAR
desc: Set the pixel sample aspect ratio.

name: Set DAR
desc: Set the frame display aspect ratio.

name: Alpha extract
desc: Extract an alpha channel as a grayscale image component.

name: Cover rect
desc: Find and cover a user specified object.

name: Cue
desc: Delay filtering to match a cue.

name: Derain
desc: Apply derain filter to the input.

name: DNN processing
desc: Apply DNN processing filter to the input.

name: Double weave
desc: Weave input video fields into double number of frames.

name: Draw graph
desc: Draw a graph using input video metadata.

name: Draw grid
desc: Draw a colored grid on the input video.

name: Draw text Full
desc: Draw text on top of video frames using libfreetype library.

name: Posterize ELBG
desc: Apply posterize effect, using the ELBG algorithm.

name: EPX scale
desc: Scale the input using EPX algorithm.

name: Equalization
desc: Adjust brightness, contrast, gamma, and saturation.

name: Frequency expression
desc: Apply arbitrary expressions to pixels in frequency domain.

name: Fill borders
desc: Fill borders of the input video.

name: Flood fill
desc: Fill area with same color with another color.

name: Frame rate
desc: Upsamples or downsamples progressive source between specified frame rates.

name: Frame step
desc: Select one frame every N frames.

name: Generic equation RGBA
desc: Apply generic equation to each pixel.

name: Generic equation RGB
desc: Apply generic equation to each pixel.

name: Generic equation YCbCrA
desc: Apply generic equation to each pixel.

name: Generic equation YCbCr
desc: Apply generic equation to each pixel.

name: Grey edge
desc: Estimates scene illumination by grey edge assumption.

name: HQ*X magnification
desc: Scale the input by 2, 3 or 4 using the hq*x magnification algorithm.

name: Hue saturation and brightness
desc: Adjust the hue and saturation of the input video.

name: Kernel deinterlacing
desc: Apply kernel deinterlacing to the input.

name: Motion iterpolate
desc: Frame rate conversion using Motion Interpolation.

name: Palette gen
desc: Find the optimal palette for a given stream.

name: Palette use
desc: Use a palette to downsample an input video stream.

name: Photosensitivity
desc: Filter out photosensitive epilepsy seizure-inducing flashes.

name: Remove logo
desc: Remove a TV logo based on a mask image.

name: Scale full
desc: Scale the input video size and/or convert the image format.

name: QuickSync scaling
desc: QuickSync video scaling and format conversion

name: Selective color
desc: Apply CMYK adjustments to specific color ranges.

name: Set params
desc: Force field, or color property for the output video frame.

name: Set range
desc: Force color range for the output video frame.

name: Smart blur
desc: Blur the input video without impacting the outlines.

name: Spp
desc: Apply a simple post processing filter.

name: DNN Super resolution
desc: Apply DNN-based image super resolution to the input.

name: Super2xSai
desc: Scale the input by 2x using the Super2xSaI pixel art algorithm.

name: Temporal histogram
desc: Compute and draw a temporal histogram.

name: Thumbnail
desc: Select the most representative frame in a given sequence of consecutive frames.

name: Trim
desc: Pick one continuous section from the input, drop the rest.

name: Unsharp
desc: Sharpen or blur the input video.

name: Ultra simple/slow postprocessing
desc: Apply Ultra Simple / Slow Post-processing filter.

name: Video stabilization detect
desc: Extract relative transformations, pass 1 of 2 for stabilization (see vidstabtransform for pass 2).

name: Video stabilization transform
desc: Transform the frames, pass 2 of 2 for stabilization (see vidstabdetect for pass 1).

name: Vignette
desc: Make or reverse a vignette effect.

name: Weave
desc: Weave input video fields into frames.

name: XBR
desc: Scale the input using xBR algorithm.

name: Z scale
desc: Apply resizing, colorspace and bit depth conversion.

name: Show waves
desc: Convert input audio to a video output.

name: Show waves pic
desc: Convert input audio to a video output single picture.
